User Notes

body.raw:
{
    "noteTitle": "My Important Note",
    "noteContent": "This is the content of my note with detailed information",
    "noteType": "TEXT",
    "color": "YELLOW",
    "category": "WORK",
    "priority": "HIGH",
    "status": "ACTIVE",
    "isPinned": false,
    "isShared": false,
    "reminderDate": "2025-12-31 10:00:00"
}

request.description: Create a new note for the authenticated user. All fields except noteTitle and noteContent are optional.

query.description: The ID of the note to retrieve (required)

request.description: Get a specific note by ID for the authenticated user.

query.description: Page number for pagination (default: 0)
Number of items per page (default: 20)
Filter by note type: TEXT, CHECKLIST, VOICE, IMAGE, LINK
Filter by color: DEFAULT, RED, ORANGE, YELLOW, GREEN, BLUE, PURPLE, PINK
Filter by category: PERSONAL, WORK, STUDY, HEALTH, FINANCE, TRAVEL, SHOPPING, OTHER
Filter by priority: LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH, URGENT
Filter by status: ACTIVE, ARCHIVED, DELETED
Filter by pinned status (true/false)
Filter by shared status (true/false)
Search term for title and content
Sort field (default: modifiedDate)
Sort order: asc or desc (default: desc)
Filter by created date range start (ISO format)
Filter by created date range end (ISO format)

request.description: Get all notes for the authenticated user with comprehensive filtering, searching, sorting and pagination options.

The new color: DEFAULT, RED, ORANGE, YELLOW, GREEN, BLUE, PURPLE, PINK (required)

request.description: Update note color for the authenticated user.
Get comprehensive note statistics for the authenticated user including counts by type, category, priority, and status.
Bulk update multiple notes for the authenticated user. Provide array of note IDs and the fields to update.
Bulk delete multiple notes for the authenticated user. By default performs soft delete unless permanentDelete=true.

request.description: Duplicate a note for the authenticated user. Creates a copy with 'Copy of' prefix in the title.
